datasetParam.name: popset_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of Popset IDs, or upload a file. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

stringParam.name: gene_id
stringParam.help: Enter an Gene Name. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

stringParam.name: author
stringParam.help: Enter an Author name. Wildcards (*) are allowed.

stringParam.name: product_wildcard
stringParam.help: Asterisks can be used as wildcard characters in a Locus Sequence Name (e.g. "dna*" or "*kinase*")

enumParam.name: text_fields
enumParam.help: Choose which text fields to search.

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: with relationship -- parent-child pairings for host taxa and all ancestors as (select distinct taxon_id, ncbi_tax_id, parent_id from sres.taxon start with ncbi_tax_id in (select host_ncbi_tax_id from apidbTuning.PopsetAttributes) connect by prior parent_id = taxon_id) select r.ncbi_tax_id as term, r.ncbi_tax_id as internal, pt.ncbi_tax_id as parentterm, sci.name || case when commons.name is null then '' else ' (' || commons.name || ')' end as display from relationship r, sres.taxon pt, sres.taxonName sci, (select taxon_id, listagg (name, ' / ') within group (order by name) as name from sres.taxonName where name_class = 'common name' group by taxon_id) commons where r.parent_id = pt.taxon_id(+) and r.taxon_id = sci.taxon_id and sci.name_class = 'scientific name' and r.taxon_id = commons.taxon_id(+) order by r.ncbi_tax_id, pt.ncbi_tax_id

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct curated_isolation_source AS term, curated_isolation_source AS internal FROM apidbTuning.popsetAttributes WHERE curated_isolation_source is NOT NULL ORDER BY lower(curated_isolation_source)

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT product AS display, replace(product, ',', '') as term, product as internal from ( SELECT distinct ga.product FROM apidbtuning.GenePopsetOverlap gio, apidbtuning.GeneAttributes ga WHERE gio.gene_source_id = ga.source_id AND min_pvalue_exp<-5) UNION SELECT 'N/A' AS display, 'N/A' AS term, 'N/A' AS internal FROM dual

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct 'Genotype #' || v.prediction_number as display, v.prediction_number as term, v.prediction_number as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where name = 'RFLP' and v.prediction_number is not null order by v.prediction_number

sqlQuery.name: I-II-III
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'BTUB'

sqlQuery.name: I-u-1
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'CS3'

sqlQuery.name: I-II-III-nd
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'Apico'

sqlQuery.name: c29-2
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'c29-2'

sqlQuery.name: c22-8
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'c22-8'

sqlQuery.name: PK1
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'PK1'

sqlQuery.name: SAG1
sqlQuery.sql: select 'Don''t Care' as term, 'all' as internal from dual union select distinct v.gene_type as term, v.gene_type as internal from dots.popsetfeature v where v.name = 'RFLP' and v.product = 'SAG1'

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct apidb.alphanumeric_str(r.title) as term, r.title as internal from ApidbTuning.PopsetAttributes ia, dots.nasequenceref sr, sres.reference r where ia.na_sequence_id = sr.na_sequence_id and r.reference_id = sr.reference_id and r.title is not null

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: with country as (select ontology_term_id from sres.OntologyTerm where name in (select curated_geographic_location from apidbTuning.popsetAttributes) and external_database_release_id in (select edr.external_database_release_id from sres.ExternalDatabase ed, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr where ed.name = 'Ontology_gaz_RSRC' and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id)), continentalization as (select subject_term_id as country_id, object_term_id as continent_id from sres.OntologyRelationship where subject_term_id in (select ontology_term_id from country)) -- countries select countryTerm.source_id as term, countryTerm.name as display, countryTerm.name as internal, continentTerm.source_id as parentTerm from continentalization c, sres.OntologyTerm countryTerm, sres.OntologyTerm continentTerm where c.country_id = countryTerm.ontology_term_id and c.continent_id = continentTerm.ontology_term_id union -- continents select source_id as term, name as display, name as internal, null as parentTerm from sres.OntologyTerm where ontology_term_id in (select continent_id from continentalization) union select 'unknown' as term, 'Unknown' as display, 'unknown' as internal, null as parentTerm from dual

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct initcap(src.continent) AS term, src.continent AS internal FROM ApiDB.Continents src WHERE src.continent is not null UNION SELECT '--None--' AS term, '0' AS internal FROM dual

sqlQuery.name: withPopsets
sqlQuery.sql:
select distinct regexp_replace(organism, '['']', '') as term, organism as internal, case when organism = 'environmental samples' then '' else regexp_replace(parent, '['']', '') end as parentTerm from (select tn.name as organism, pn.name as parent from (select t.taxon_id, t.parent_id from sres.taxon t start with taxon_id in (select distinct tn.taxon_id from apidb.organism o, sres.taxonname tn where family_name_for_files is not null and tn.name = o.family_name_for_files
-- TODO: these can be removed when the workflow populates apidb.organism.family_name_for_files union select taxon_id from sres.taxonname where name = case when '@PROJECT_ID@' = 'PlasmoDB' then 'Plasmodium' else '' end ) connect by prior taxon_id = parent_id ) tree, sres.taxonname tn, sres.taxonname pn where tree.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id and tn.name_class = 'scientific name' and tree.parent_id = pn.taxon_id and pn.name_class = 'scientific name' and not tn.name = pn.name ) start with organism in (select distinct organism from apidbtuning.popsetattributes) connect by prior parent = organism order by organism
